issue.title: Improve examples, particularly animation related examples

content.raw: I'm looking at your pull request. Thanks for tackling some of the examples. I started a prototype of how I'd like the example code to be updated and synchronized with the wiki tutorials in #951, which was implemented for just a few example plugins in pull request #938. Eventually, we will have all the example code building in continuous integration with updated tutorials.
